error.message: Class Drupal\Console\Core\Command\Shared\CommandTrait not found and could not be autoloaded.
Class Drupal\Console\Core\Command\Shared\CommandTrait not found and could not be autoloaded.

Call to deprecated function system_get_info(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::service('extension.list.$type')->getExtensionInfo() or \Drupal::service('extension.list.$type')->getAllInstalledInfo() instead.
Call to deprecated constant FILE_EXISTS_REPLACE: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::EXISTS_REPLACE.
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_save_data(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::saveData().
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_delete_recursive(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::deleteRecursive().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ludwig.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
